Plot usage frequency

{% raw %} 
def plot_use_freq(df_m, LEX):
    chart = alt.Chart(df_m)\
        .mark_line(point=True)\
         .encode(
             x=alt.X('month:T', title=''),
             y=alt.Y('comm_n:Q', title='comments / month')
         )\
         .properties(title=LEX)\
         .interactive()
    return chart
{% endraw %}
